lyrics.lyrictitle: Chiisana Ame no Hi no Ku

lyric.verse: Chiisaku naita Ookina sora ga naiteita Me buita GOOYAA Tooi shio ni inorinagara Umi wo shiranai ame tabeta
Ten made nobite Takusan no mi wo tsuketa nara Shima ni todoku ne
Dakedo koko wa samui to itte Yume wo minagara Hon no sukoshi dake naita

translator.translatorname: Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy, Goshi Manabe

lyric.verse: I cried a little Big sky was crying A gourd which was given birth Ate the rain who doesn't know the sea Was praying to the far tide
If we grew up to the sky And had a lot of fruit We would reach to my place
"But it is cold out here," cried a little dreaming ...
